name: Alnuhazux

atWill.name: Deft Strike
atWill.description: You slip past your foe's defenses and deal a precise strike.

atWill.name: Sly Flourish
atWill.description: You artfully dodge around your foe, distracting it with a series of feints before landing a telling blow.

encounter.name: Dazing Strike
encounter.description: You slam your weapon into your foe with a jarring blow that leaves it seeing double.

encounter.name: Jumping Attack
encounter.description: You leap over obstacles and slice at your foe as you descend.

encounter.name: Leaping Dodge
encounter.description: You avoid your enemy's attack with a quick leap that carries you out of the path of danger.

daily.name: Blinding Barrage
daily.description: You spray dust or sand into your enemies' eyes as you tumble among them, striking at them while they're blinded.

daily.name: Easy Target
daily.description: You puzzle your foe with an elaborate series of maneuvers, then strike with deadly precision.

utility.name: Fortitude of the Sword
utility.description: You tough out a devastating attack, focusing on your next strike.

utility.name: Slick Feint
utility.description: You distract your foe with a cunning feint to make your next attack more effective.

notes: Tiefling racial: +2 Bluff, +2 Stealth, +5 fire resistance, Infernal Wrath 1/encounter

conditions.name: Marked
conditions.description: -2 to attacks that don't include the marker as a target

name: Krusk

atWill.name: Lance of Faith
atWill.description: A beam of white light streams toward your enemy, bowling over that creature and burning it with radiant power.

atWill.name: Priest's Shield
atWill.description: A shield of divine energy protects you from harm and helps your ally against the same enemy.

atWill.name: Howling Strike
atWill.description: You let loose a fierce howl and strike with a powerful blow.

encounter.name: Divine Glow
encounter.description: A burning column of radiance bursts from above, searing your foes and empowering your allies.

encounter.name: Healing Strike
encounter.description: You attack your foe and invoke divine power to heal you or an ally near you.

encounter.name: Swift Charge
encounter.description: You barrel toward an enemy, heedless of danger. Your speed and ferocity catch your enemy off guard.

daily.name: Flame Strike
daily.description: A column of divine fire burns down from above, dealing fire and radiant damage.

daily.name: Rage Strike
daily.description: You strike with the full fury of your rage.

utility.name: Blessing of Fervor
utility.description: You channel divine power into your allies to aid their actions.

utility.name: Savage Advance
utility.description: Your unbridled rage drives you forward through the battlefield.

notes: Half-Orc racial: +2 Intimidate, +2 Endurance, Furious Assault 1/encounter

name: Oliver

atWill.name: Chaos Bolt
atWill.description: You unleash a blast of many-colored energy that ricochets from enemy to enemy.

atWill.name: Storm Walk
atWill.description: Your form crackles with lightning, and you fly forward to blast your foes with electricity.

encounter.name: Lightning Daggers
encounter.description: You hurl small bolts of lightning that explode like grenades, shattering into smaller lightning bolts that strike adjacent enemies.

encounter.name: Bedeviling Burst
encounter.description: You change your enemy's perceptions, and what was once an ally now seems a deadly foe.

encounter.name: Thundering Roar
encounter.description: You emit a sonic cry that batters your foes, knocking them away from you.

daily.name: Dazzling Ray
daily.description: You loose a barrage of meteoric energy that overwhelms your enemy.

daily.name: Lightning Breath
daily.description: Crackling arcs of lightning leap from your mouth, burning enemies in front of you and blasting through to enemies behind them.

utility.name: Elemental Shift
utility.description: You briefly take on the form of an elemental creature, slipping between spaces with incredible speed.

utility.name: Swift Escape
utility.description: As danger threatens, you teleport away in a flash of light.

notes: Human racial: +1 to all defenses, bonus at-will power, bonus feat, bonus skill

conditions.name: Dazed
conditions.description: Grant combat advantage, can take only one action (standard, move, or minor) during your turn, can't flank

name: Raza

atWill.name: Eldritch Blast
atWill.description: You fire a bolt of dark energy at your enemy.

atWill.name: Dire Radiance
atWill.description: You pierce your enemy with a ray of dark energy.

atWill.name: Chaos Bolt
atWill.description: You unleash a blast of many-colored energy that ricochets from enemy to enemy.

encounter.name: Witchfire
encounter.description: Flames dance upon your enemy as you engulf it with fire.

encounter.name: Vampiric Embrace
encounter.description: Dark energy streams from your enemy, giving you vitality.

encounter.name: Thunder Slam
encounter.description: You crash a thunderclap of sonic energy into your foe.

daily.name: Curse of the Dark Dream
daily.description: Your enemy's mind is caught in a dark and terrible dreamscape that it can't escape.

daily.name: Flames of the Pit
daily.description: Hellfire erupts on your enemy, and you gain power over your foe.

utility.name: Shadow Veil
utility.description: Shadows wrap around you, hiding you from your enemies.

utility.name: Ethereal Stride
utility.description: You become insubstantial and step through your enemies as if they were no more solid than smoke.

notes: Drow racial: +2 Stealth, +2 Intimidate, Darkfire 1/encounter, Cloud of Darkness 1/encounter

conditions.name: Slowed
conditions.description: Your speed becomes 2, and you take a -2 penalty to AC, Reflex, and attack rolls
